One day, a new boy came to her class. His name was Ben. He looked sad and shy. He did not have any toys or friends. Lily saw him sitting alone in a corner. She felt sorry for him. She wanted to make him happy.

Lily thought for a moment. She liked candy, but she also liked Tom. He was her best friend. She nodded.
"OK, deal. I'm sorry for being a robber. You're a good cop. Can we be friends again?" Lily said.
Tom smiled and hugged Lily. "Of course we can be friends again. You're a good robber. Well, not really, but you know what I mean. Come on, let's eat some candy together. I'll encourage you to run faster next time." Tom said.

One day, a little girl named Lily found a box of crayons. The box had many colors, but she liked the deep blue crayon the most. She used it to draw a big sea with fish and a boat. She was very happy with her drawing.
Lily wanted to show her drawing to her mom. But when she went to find her mom, she saw that the deep blue crayon was gone! She was sad and looked everywhere for it. She thought she would never find it again.
Then, she saw her little brother, Tim, holding the crayon.

Once upon a time, there was an elderly lady who loved to paint. She painted all day long. She painted pretty flowers, big trees, and happy animals. She had a lot of fun when she painted.
One day, the elderly lady had a lot of waste from her painting. She had used many colors and made a big mess. She didn't know what to do with the waste.
Then, she had an idea. She took the waste and made a new painting. She painted a beautiful rainbow with all the colors. Everyone who saw it loved it. The elderly lady learned that she could make something beautiful

"Yes, Sue! I want to play!" Tim said with a big smile.

to his mom. When she saw it, she smiled and told him she loved it. She said that it showed how creative and brave he was. The boy felt happy and proud.

to the store with her mom. They needed to buy some yogurt. Lily loved yogurt. It was her favorite snack. She knew that yogurt had a value, and it made her strong and healthy.
